replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 strawmaine 于 2012-4-7 02:06 编辑 
a2532003 发表于 2012-4-7 01:40 
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=19768&highlight=%B3%C7%B1%A4

帮忙弄成1，1
以后不要在随便一个帖子上问问题了。。。这是材质帖，你问与主题无关的问题会让我很困扰。。。你可以加我好友发我消息问我，也可以直接把问题发问答区
[attach]20490[/attach]给你打包了一个，直接放mods文件夹就可以用了。前提是你的MC装了modloader 和 modloader mp

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
sealol 发表于 2012-4-27 22:32 
地址来了
http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/1075730-ornate-resurrected-updated-12x-64x-hd-texture- ...
Posted Yesterday, 10:41 PM
SEMI-FINAL UPDATE IS OUT!! 
the reason I say semi final is due to the fact that I am about to start working on the ender dragon and who knows how long that will take, so I decided to go ahead and give everybody the updated version. Everything is done for the most part. one I finish the dragon then I will start making everything look as fancy as possible. also please vote on the poll about the new golem, I just had that "dark themed idea" for him and I want to know what everybody thinks!
UPDATE INCLUDES:
-fixed gui
-iron golem
-50% fixed cauldron(still needs one last spot fixed)
-new potions bottle
-fixed random crack in breaking animation
-fixed small villager problem
-fixed flame problem
-other small touch ups.
